# GET /v1/gameCenterActivityLocalizations/{id}/relationships/image | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterActivityLocalizations/{id}/relationships/image ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterActivityLocalizations-_id_-relationships-image)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterActivityLocalizations/{id}/relationships/image 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterActivityLocalizations/{id}/relationships/image

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterActivityLocalizations-_id_-relationships-image#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterActivityLocalizations/{id}/relationships/image
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterActivityLocalizations-_id_-relationships-image#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterActivityLocalizations-_id_-relationships-image#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterActivityLocalizationImageLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenteractivitylocalizationimagelinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterActivityLocalizations-_id_-relationships-image#see-also)

### [Managing Game Center activities](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterActivityLocalizations-_id_-relationships-image#Managing-Game-Center-activities)

[`Read activity localization information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivitylocalizations-_id_)Get information for a specific Game Center activity localization.[`Read image information for an activity localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivitylocalizations-_id_-image)Get details about the image for a specific Game Center activity localization.[`Add an activity localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-gamecenteractivitylocalizations)Add a localization for a specific Game Center activity.[`Modify an activity localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenteractivitylocalizations-_id_)Update localization information for a specific Game Center activity.[`Delete an activity localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-gamecenteractivitylocalizations-_id_)Remove a specific localization from a Game Center activity.
